text: Inheriting his father’s spirit and ferocity, Zhang Bao revels in the rush of the battlefield, again and again proving himself to be worthy of his father’s legacy.
Once, Chunyu Qiong was a colonel of the Emperor’s own army. He will regain that pride.
Of energetic and bright personality, she inherited her mother’s feminine charms but her father’s resilience and constitution. With a tiger for a father, only an Emperor will be a worthy husband.
